General.Name: Agro Phos India Limited
General.Description: Agro Phos (India) Limited manufactures and sells fertilizers products in India. The company offers single super phosphate; nitrogen phosphate and potassium; copper, magnesium, zinc, calcium, and ferrous sulphate; and organic manure fertilizers. It also trades in diammoium phosphate, ammonium sulphate, muriate of potash, urea, and other fertilizers. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Indore, India.
